page.title: 05TYWARDREATH PRIMARY SCHOOL 2
page.content: In the {afternoons}we have{all sorts {of lessons,}so I will tell you about them. We have lessons like History, Geography or Topic. This term we have had two topics,{The Domesday Project} and {Life in the 1800's.}We visited Morwellham to see a mining village so we could imagine what Tywardreath was like. In summer we go{swimming}three times a week. We have our own pool. It is indoors and heated but not very deep. I enjoy{music.}I play descant and treble recorders and guitar. Most groups are after school. In winter we have P.E. and Netball or Football and in the summer swimming and athletics. I play{Netball}for the school. Netball and Football teams practise twice a week after school. We have 2 netball courts and 2 football pitches.
